kioskInfoDescription: This kiosk uses rPPG technology to measure your heart rate, stress level, and emotions.
diagnosisInfoDescription: In addition to rPPG analysis, we provide surveys for diagnosing depression and dementia.
howToStartDescription: Choose the type of diagnosis you want and respond to the questions accurately.
checkYourResultDescription: Once the diagnosis and rPPG analysis are complete, you will receive a detailed report.
disclaimerDescription:
Wearing heavy makeup may affect the accuracy of rPPG analysis.
Please keep this in mind!
cameraTipsDescription: For accurate analysis, avoid moving too much or staying too far from the camera.
